discussion_comments.comment_body: We are returning the authentication_data in payment checks for nuvei. This authentication data is dynamic and might need to change for cards . Hence we need to ignore this field when ever we are testing in cypress.

these can be randomly generated too by making use of `cypress-tests/cypress/utils/RequestBodyUtils.js`!

fyi, you do not need to do hard code these in the first place! cypress takes care of it.
